attributes.action: Compensation from vauxhall for zafira b owners .
attributes.additional_details: Zafira b cars still catching fire after 2 recalls .
attributes.background: We would like compensation from vauxhaull for drivers who own zafira b cars due to the in going safety issues surrounding them , because our cars have been devalued because of all if this , and given vauxhaull knew about the major defect since 2010.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions that call for an action that Parliament or the Government can take. 

You may want to consider starting a petition that calls for the Government to conduct an inquiry into the safety of the Zafira B or to provide a compensation scheme for people affected by product recalls.
